id.description: Unique identifier for the engagement note

properties.description: Represents the properties associated with the engagement note

hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids.description: Business unit ids assigned to the note

hs_at_mentioned_owner_ids.description: Owner ids mentioned in the note

hs_attachment_ids.description: Attachment ids linked to the note

hs_body_preview_html.description: HTML version of the note body preview

hs_body_preview_is_truncated.description: Indicates if the body preview is truncated

hs_createdate.description: Date and time of note creation

hs_follow_up_action.description: Follow-up action specified in the note

hs_gdpr_deleted.description: Indicates if the note is GDPR deleted

hs_lastmodifieddate.description: Date and time of the last modification

hs_merged_object_ids.description: IDs of objects merged in the note

hs_modified_by.description: User who last modified the note

hs_product_name.description: Product name associated with the note

hs_queue_membership_ids.description: Queue membership IDs related to the note

hs_updated_by_user_id.description: User ID who last updated the note

hs_user_ids_of_all_notification_follower.description: User IDs of all notification followers

hs_user_ids_of_all_notification_unfollow.description: User IDs of all notification unfollowers

hubspot_team_id.description: Team ID associated with the note

hs_all_owner_ids.description: All owner ids associated with the note

hs_all_team_ids.description: All team ids associated with the note

hs_all_accessible_team_ids.description: All team ids that have access to the note
